aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Lightning

  • Object
    • Lightning

  • public class Lightning
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Lightning settings.
    Local Call
    Lightning settings are all local.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
